mapper.select: select r.* from sys_user u inner join user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id and ur.is_deleted = 0 inner join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id and r.is_deleted = 0 where u.user_name = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and u.is_deleted = 0
select r.* from sys_role r inner join role_resource rr on r.id = rr.role_id and rr.is_deleted = 0 where resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and r.is_deleted = 0
